original_text: The master of the party tasted the water. The water had now become wine! The master did not know where the wine had come from. But the servants who had given it to him knew about it. Then the master asked the new husband to come to him.
korean_text: 연회장은 물로 된 포도주를 맛보고도 어디서 났는지 알지 못하되 물 떠온 하인들은 알더라 연회장이 신랑을 불러

sentences.original_text: The master of the party tasted the water
The water had now become wine
where the wine had come from
But the servants knew about it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하인들은 그것에 대해 알고 있었다

sentences.original_text: who had given it to him
the new husband to come to him
